content: We have a couple of Pharmacy profiles that we want to start iterating on rapidly. I'm not sure what has been decided at ITI or IHE, so can I take a look at the currently proposed rules and conventions?
glad to help. best to have a working session. all of our guidance is on the IHE github in the supplement-template wiki
Mary handles publication. Publication will go onto http://profiles.ihe.net... pharmacy needs to pick a folder for pharmacy publications, which will become part of your canonical.
Thanks. I think we can discuss some of these aspects and get some agreement. Should these be on an IHE FHIR call, or does Pharmacy bring its own flavour and we then reconcile?
"At this time there is not a tool in the IG build that will convert UML into PNG" - is that needed?
